â€œjana kathawaka thiyanawa,kale raja thoraganna saththu athara thibuna chanda wimasimak gana.kale raja wenna idiripath wune sinhayayi wrukayayi.sinhaya kiwwa me balanna mage kesarawala lassanaâ€¦balanna age raththaran pata man wage rajek hitiyoth oogollanta aadambara wenna puluwan kiyala.wrukaya kiwwa mata thiyenne prabala katahadak hathurek aawoth ka agahala hari obawa beraganna mata puluwan kiyala.me dennagen kenekuta chande denna chandadayakayo widihata hitiye hawo muwo bataluwo wage aya.aththama prashne thibune sinhayage lassanawath wrukayage katahada ganawath nemeyi.prashne me dennama anek saththu maragena kana aya wuna eka.anthime di saththu kawuru raja wunath thaman rajata goduru wena iranamakata watila hitiya.

"prajathanthrawadaya" kiyala api igena gena thiyana sankalpayata kiwa yuthu aththa nama wu kali dhanapathi prajathanthrawadayayi.yuropaye rajandu kramayata wiruddhawayi dhaneshwara prajathanthrawadaya ithihasaye bihiwune.nyayathmaka methanadi siyalu denata siwil ha deshapalana ayithiwasikam pradanaya kerenawa wunath samajayak panthiwalata kadila giya sandarbhayaka ema ayithin purna lesa bhukthi widinna puluwan wenne samaja aadhipathyaya darana panthinta pamanayi.lokaye ithama diyunu ratawal kiyala salakena brithanyaya ho eksath janapadaya wage ratawalatath mema karuna poduyi.me ratawaladith "prajathanthrawadaya" yanna kriyathmaka wenne supiri dhanawath panthin ha samaja stharayanta wadi wasi gena dena aakarayakata.
